Business Unit: Required field. Needs to match the AP code for associated property exactly
Vendor ID: Required Field. Must exactly match Vendor ID to associate with this payment.
Invoice ID: Required Field. Invoice reference to associate with payment.
Invoice Period: Full date representing period against which payment is to be posted. Use format m/d/yyyy
Payment ID: Number uniquely identifying this payment for this invoice/vendor combination
Payment Date: Required field. Date of payment. Format as m/d/yyyy
Check Number: Required field. Check number of payment.
Payment Amount: Required field. Amount of payment. Numeric field; omit denomination characters and commas.
Payment Status: Required field. Value to be one of "Paid", "Void", or "NSF"
Integration Package: Required field. Must match  integration package name selected during upload.
